title: Euro Truck Simulator 2 (Mod) - Poland Rebuilding 1.96 + ProMods

Scania - GdaÃ…â€žsk, Bielsko-Biala,

Map to run requires:
1) having the game ETS 2 beta 1.18.1 / 1.18.1s (steam)
2) installed two additions: GOING EAST DLC and DLC Scandinavia
3) 1.95 promods map

Mapmakerzy - miracle worker (alphabetically):
Czaja
Desirae
Graku

Indispensable tester - Mirma
Project management, merging maps, economics, final adjustments ... etc - RadolSzczecin

Special thanks to FLD, Michal_Z_gno, satan19990, _PMA, the group promods
Thanks to all who have less or smaller way have contributed to the, year maps in this form.

After unpacking we have 3 map files. (Do not change their names)
The map has to load the map file promods

zzz 01 PolRebuild_def_1.96 (754 KB)
zzz 02 PolRebuild_map_1.96 (223 MB)
zzz 03 PolRebuild_model_1.96 (693 MB)

ProMods 1.95

How to activate the mod
After downloading, make sure that all 3 files are placed in the 'mod' game Euro Truck Simulator 2.

You should have:

promods-def-vXXX.scs
promods-map-vXXX.scs
promods-vXXX.scs

(Where XXX is the version number)

Now turn on the game and go to the profile selection screen, select your profile, and press EDITION
Make sure that all 3 files are marked in the profile.

If you have an older version ProMods deactivate or delete it from your mod folder!
